text: Anata wa musa no nochi no, Isuraeru no shison no choro-tachi ni tsuite shiranakatta no ka. Kare-ra wa, jibun no yogen-sha ni mukatte itta. `Watashi-tachi no tame ni, hitori no o o tate nasai. So sureba, watashi-tachi wa arra no michi no tame ni, tatakaudearou.' Sokode kare wa,`anata gata ni tatakai ga meiji rarete mo, tatakawanai node wanai ka.' To itta. Kare-ra wa (kotaete) `watashi-tachi wa doshite, arra no michi no tame ni tatakawazu ni i rareyou ka, jibun no ie o owa re, kodomo kara mo hanarete iru no ni.' To itta. Tokoroga tatakai ga kare-ra ni meiji rareru to, kare-ra no naka no shosu no mono o nozoki somuki satta. Arra wa fugi o okonau mono o jukuchi shite ora reru
